snippet: Apps can put a dictionary, graphing calculator, organizer and more in the palms of students’ hands.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column examines several applications that will be useful to students who are returning to school, including dictionaries, cloud services and apps that emulate graphing calculators.
lead_paragraph: Apps can put a dictionary, graphing calculator, organizer and more in the palms of students’ hands.

headline.print_headline: Take Note of These Back-to-School Aids
headline.main: Take Note of These Back-to-School Aids
